key.remorphed_menu: Open menu to choose second shape
remorphed.help.welcome: Welcome to Remorphed, based on Identity by Draylar, written by To_Craft.
remorphed.help.credits: Thank you to Supporters of this project!
remorphed.help.support_label: Experiencing an issue or want to post suggestions?
remorphed.help.support_description: Reach out to the Woodwalkers GitHub repository at https://github.com/ToCraft/woodwalkers-mod.
remorphed.help.ability_description_1: To use a mob's ability, press the R key.
remorphed.help.ability_description_2: A cooldown indicator will appear in the bottom-right of the screen to show you when the ability can be used again.
remorphed.help.ability_description_3: For a full list of abilities, visit https://github.com/ToCraft/woodwalkers-mod/wiki/Abilities.
remorphed.help.config_description: Visit the config file at /config/remorphed.json5 to control all elements of the mod.
remorphed.help.credits_general: General: To_Craft, Chronos_Sacaria, Draylar, x64architecture, Pyrofab, AllanChain, James103, lawleagle
remorphed.help.credits_translators: Translators: Right now just me (To_Craft), but YOU are welcome the help! There's even a custom texture for devs o.O
remorphed.help.return: Press any key to close this menu.
